72-HOUR LAUNCH CHECKLIST
========================

PRE-LAUNCH (Hour 0-4)
---------------------
[ ] Finalize pricing
[ ] Set up payment processing
[ ] Create landing page
[ ] Write launch email
[ ] Prepare social posts

LAUNCH DAY (Hour 4-24)
----------------------
[ ] Send email to list
[ ] Post on Twitter/X
[ ] Post on LinkedIn
[ ] Reply to all comments
[ ] Track signups

POST-LAUNCH (Hour 24-72)
------------------------
[ ] Send follow-up email
[ ] Share customer wins
[ ] Engage with shares/retweets
[ ] Document learnings
[ ] Plan next offer
